forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will give way to lingering snow showers this afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will become lighter this afternoon. High near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low -7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will transition to snow showers late. Low 22F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the morning. High near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 13F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 11F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 14F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near -10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 18F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
